reviewtext: I bought mine in 1992 without trying them on, they just looked nice back then. Well, they are still going strong. I had to replace the ear pads, but that was the best thing I could have done since I replaced them with the velour pads. They are so comfortable. These are also awesome for plane trips because they seem to block out most of the noise. I don't really know if that was the case with the stock pads. I hope the new ones are still as good as the old ones.
summary: Still going strong after sooooo many years
